results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n gives marks on lexicographically earliest n-mark optimal Golomb ruler.
comment: Golomb ruler: Finite set with property that no difference between any two numbers is repeated and largest number is minimized.
See A003022 for further information and additional references.
link: J. B. Shearer, Table of Known Optimal Golomb Rulers
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Golomb rulers.
Index entries for sequences related to Golomb rulers
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 04 2006
